title: Multilingual
description: OverBot supports up to 7 languages! You can help translating if your language is not available yet.

title: Check your stats
description: Check both your quick play and competitive stats in a single embed, so you can easily compare them.

title: Link your profiles
description: Link up to 5 profiles to your Discord ID without using any external links. Upgrade to Premium to be able to link more profiles!

title: Play Overwatch trivia
description: Play Overwatch trivia and climb the leaderboard! It is also possible to contribute by submit new questions to be added to the game.

title: News and more
description: Check the latest Overwatch news, patch notes and server status information.
